Get to know more about Top University, Fee Structure, No Donation, Infrastructure, Language, & Hostel', canonical: 'https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/mbbs-admission-in-europe-from-mci-approved-university', meta: { charset: 'utf-8', name: { keywords: 'MBBS Admission in Europe' } } }; return (

MBBS in Europe

Europe is one of the preferred destinations to study MBBS. Most of the students Study MBBS in Europe as all the universities/colleges provide high-quality education at affordable fees. The professors at Europe Medical colleges/universities are experts at their subjects.

Every year, a huge number of students take MBBS admission in Europe because all the universities/colleges are approved by MCI which enables the students to practice in India after completing the MBBS in Europe. The students can also pursue a PG degree from India if they want but only after clearing the MCI screening test. The duration of MBBS in Europe in English medium is 6 years.

About Europe

Europe is the second smallest continent in size and the third largest in population. Europe is located entirely in the Northern Hemisphere and mostly in the Eastern Hemisphere. The European continent includes 50 countries and of the European countries such as France, Ukraine, Georgia, Armenia, Germany, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, 27 nations belong to the European Union which is a political and economic union. The climate in Europe is moderate & suitable for the students coming from the countries. The overall atmosphere in the different seasons is temperate.

Why Study MBBS in Europe

MBBS in Europe for Indian Students is the best destination because of the following reasons:

  • The medical education system in German is considered one of the finest in the world.
  • Each Europe medical college are mostly acknowledged and recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI)
  • Europe is one of the leading countries that specialize in highly advanced medical care.
  • After completing the MBBS Admission in Europe, an Indian student becomes eligible for a permanent residence certificate.
  • The hospitals associated with the Europe medical college provide the best quality health care and utilize the latest medical technologies and instruments.
  • There is no requirement of any entrance exam is required to take admission in Europe medical universities/colleges.
  • Every Europe medical university/colleges provide quality private & government hospitals for internships.
  • MBBS in Europe fees is very affordable and the cost of living is also reasonable.
  • Europe medical college integrates theoretical and practical learning in such a way that students are taught in the most effective way possible.
  • The medium of instruction in Europe Medical College / Universities is English and Europe.

Benefits of Studying MBBS in Europe for Indian Students 2020

Europe is the best place for Indian students to study MBBS because of the following benefits:

  • There is no requirement for any entrance exam or donation to take admission in Europe Medical College.
  • Top medical colleges or universities in Europe are recognized by MCI and WHO
  • The cost of living is very affordable during medicine course in Europe.
  • The students will get a scholarship after clearing the scholarship exam.
  • MBBS in Europe is recognized across the globe.
  • The students do not need to pay any capitation fee.
  • The mode of instruction is English in Europe.
  • The students get the opportunity to practice medicine under the guidance of renowned doctors.
  • The tuition fee in Europe medical college is quite low and affordable.

Eligibility Criteria for MBBS in Europe

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to pursue MBBS in Europe are as follows:

  • The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 70% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to Europe Medical College/ Universities.
  • The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for MBBS in Europe.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students must not be more than 25 years of age.

Top Universities to Study MBBS in Europe

  • Humboldt University
  • Philipps University
  • University Heidelburg
  • Lubeck University
  • Rwth Aachen University
  • Magdeburg University
  • Munster University
  • Wurzburg University
  • Tubingen University
  • Freiburg University
  • Witten/Hercke University
  • Albert Ludwing’s Universitat Freiburg

Requirements for MBBS Admission in Europe 2020-2021

The necessary documents for taking MBBS Admission in Europe are the following:

  • A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees to Europe Medical College.
  • A medical checkup certificate is also essential

MBBS Fees in Europe 2020-2021

The fees structure for the Indian students studying MBBS in Europe will range from 10 to 20 lakhs per year.

MBBS in Europe Advice for Indian Students

The following are the advices for the Indian students that take MBBS admission in Europe:

  • The students should always be cautious of their surroundings.
  • The Indian Students are advised to apply in the Europe Medical College within the time
  • They must avoid the company of dangerous people.
  • They should not stay outside late in the night.

Pros and Cons of Studying MBBS in Europe

Every country has its pros and cons that can benefit as well as effect Indian students who seek admission to Europe Medical College. But Europe has more benefits as compared to other countries with very fewer cons:

The MBBS degree that students obtain from Europe medical college is globally renowned and holds great worth. The Indian students that take admission in best colleges/universities in Europe are recognized by the MCI (medical council of India). The students become eligible for working in government hospitals after completing MBBS in Europe.

The climate conditions in Europe is cold most of the time most of the time that might be hard for students to adapt. The local language in Europe is German so the students might feel the language as a barrier outside the university campus. But the coaching in Europe Medical College is conducted in English.

VISA Procedure for MBBS in Europe

The students need to fill up the online application form with the right details all the required documents. The students then will receive offer letter from the university that they have applied to study MBBS in Europe. They need to pay the MBBS Fees in Europe and then they have to apply for the visa and once they receive the student VISA card, they can book the tickets!

MCI Coaching in Europe!

It is necessary that the students must take MCI coaching in Europe that enables them to practice medicine in India. NBE conducts MCI Screening Test which is a licensing exam to practice in India after completing MBBS in Europe. But the students that wish to pursue postgraduate medical courses in India need to qualify National Exit Test (NEXT) exam and also offer license to practice their medical career in India.

{/* POP UP Btn */} setModalShow(false)} /> {/* POP UP Btn Ends */}
USMLE (United States Medical Licensing Examination) Coaching in Europe

USMLE is the United States Medical Licensing Examination conducted for MBBS graduates that wish to start their medical careers in the USA. USMLE is classified into 3 steps as below:

  • USMLE is a one-day test that includes multiple-choice questions. Most of the students prefer to give at the end of the second year of their MBBS course. It focuses on the knowledge of basic sciences such as anatomy, biochemistry, behavioral sciences, pathology, pharmacology, immunology, physiology, and microbiology.
  • It is a two day test that will be given by the MBBS students in the fourth year of their MBBS course. This exam is further classified into two stages such as- CK (Clinical Knowledge) and CS (Clinical Skills).
  • It is also a two-day test that students generally prefer to five once they complete the first-year residency. Day 1 Test of Step 3 is known as the Foundation of Independent Practice (FIP) which is an MCQ format test. Day 2 Test is known as Advanced Clinical Medicine (ACM) in which students need to attempt about 180 MCQs and 13 computer-based case simulations.

PG Options after MBBS in Europe

Europe medical universities provide several types of medical courses to the students. The following are the PG Options after MBBS in Europe:

  • The students can opt for MD in Europe
  • They can do medical specialization
  • They have to study only for 6 years for MD courses in Europe
  • They do not have to spend much amount for post-graduation courses from Europe.

Vacations during MBBS in Europe

Europe medical universities provide vacations to students who are pursuing MBBS in Europe such as:

  • The students will get summer vacations in between July to August
  • They will get winter vacations in between February to March
  • They will also get Christmas holidays

Career Options after Completing MBBS in Europe

Following are the career options after completing MBBS in Europe:

  • The students can opt for the PG course.
  • They can join medical research works in Europe.
  • Some German universities offer the opportunity to the MBBS graduates to practice in private hospitals
  • After the completion of the MBBS in Europe, The students can also work in various countries at a high salary package.

Students face huge problems due to the Fraud Agents

The students do not have to pay MBBS 6-year fees together in any government medical university in Europe. If any agent asks for the whole 6-year fees, it’s their own scheme. If the students pay whole fees and got MBBS Admission in Europe where they taught MBBS in Europe then they cannot change the university.

As there is no requirement to pay any donation fee or capitation fee for taking MBBS Admission in Europe, so the students must aware of not paying any donation fees to any agent.

It is recommended to students to qualify MCI screening test coaching (online) in India only before going Europe for pursuing MBBS. They do not have to trust any false promises of any agent. Because the MCI screening test coaching is not provided in most of the Europe medical universities.

Therefore, the student should consult Destinex for any information regarding MBBS Admission in Europe. We provide transparent information to the students so that they fulfill their wish to pursue MBBS in Europe in the English-taught universities with reasonable and accurate fees.

How to reserve your MBBS Seat in Europe for 2020 Admission

Europe is the best place that has the best institutes of medicine in the world. The admission procedure for MBBS in Europe is quite hard compared to other countries. Europe provides free education that is extremely challenging for international students to get an MBBS seat with the top German medical universities. The following is the eligibility criteria to get admission with best Europe medical universities:

  • The students must have 90% marks in 12th standard
  • They must have cleared the 1st year of graduation with over 58%.
  • Proof of certificate of clearing DSH (Deutsche Sprachprüfung für den Hochschulzugang) exam.
  • Marks of TOEFL and IELTS are compulsory.

{/* POP UP Btn */} setModalShow(false)} /> {/* POP UP Btn Ends */}
Service & Consultancy Charges of Destinex

Destinex is one of the best overseas education consultants in India. We have already placed hundreds of Indian students in Europe for pursuing MBBS course in the top medical universities that taught MBBS course in English language.

We provide proper guidance to the students regarding the top universities, it’s fees structure, and many more things so that the students can have brighter career opportunities. Our aim is to place Indian students to the MCI approved Europe medical universities with reasonable fees and top-class facilities.

It is recommended to students not to take admission in free medical colleges in Europe because they lack quality education and infrastructure. But we place the students only at the best medical universities/colleges in Europe.

Services by Destinex for Abroad Education

Applying MBBS in Europe from Destinex, the students have the following benefits:

  • MCI screening test coaching online
  • Accurate and transparent counseling for MBBS in many countries
  • Admission in top medical universities approved by MCI
  • Perfect visa application documents without any rejection
  • Safe travel services provided to students going abroad to pursue MBBS
  • Support for accommodation at the campus

Our Process of conducting Student Counseling

It is advisable to students to attend our counseling regarding MBBS in Europe to clear their doubts:

  • Online Counseling
    We provide complete information about the MBBS abroad, selection of the best university, advantages & disadvantages of pursuing MBBS in different countries, and clear each doubt of the students so that they can study MBBS and fulfill their wish.The students can get online counseling session from the CEO of Destinex and can clear their doubts.
  • Tele-Counseling
    Destinex has a team of expert counselors that provide accurate information from MBBS to PG courses to the students. The students can interact with any of the expert counselor through phone call, SMS, Whatsapp, Email, and more and get resolved their queries regarding MBBS in abroad.
  • Personal Counseling
    The students do not need to travel to our head office only as they can also visit our office in Bangalore, Kochi, Chennai, Hyderabad, Bihar, Lucknow & Mumbai.

FAQ's to Study MBBS in Europe
Which university are the best options to study MBBS in Europe for Indian Students?

  • Heidelberg University
  • Lubeck University
  • Rwth Aachen University
  • Magdeburg University
  • Munster University

 Is an MBBS in Europe a Good Option?

Yes, pursuing MBBS in Europe is definitely a good option truly because it is well known for its quality and reasonable medical education.

 How it is beneficial to study MBBS in Europe for Indian students?

Medical students coming from India to pursue MBBS in Europe can easily get Indian food in hostels which makes them comfortable in adjusting to this country. MBBS in Europe is recognized worldwide as the Europe Medical College are acknowledged by WHO and MCI.

 Can a medical student study MBBS in Europe at affordable fee structure?

Europe Medical College charges affordable tuition fees from international students. So, it is quite worthy & cost-effective for Indian students to study MBBS in Europe.

 What are the admission requirements for an MBBS in Europe?

  • The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 70% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to Europe Medical College/ Universities.
  • The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for MBBS in Europe.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students must not be more than 25 years of age.

 What is the NEET minimum marks to join an MBBS in Europe 2020?

The NEET minimum marks to join an MBBS in Europe 2020 is 50 percentile.
